trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around July 9th 2010
divs: sighting detailshi guys, me and my wife have witnessed what we would call a ufo sighting over london tonight, just thought you would be interested. it happened between 10.30pm and 11pm, there were loads of them (maybe about a hundred in total or more) coming from south west flying over london and disappearing to the north east for about 20-30mn in total. they looked like orange lights flying fast and high, we thought it could be balloons but there wasn't a strong wind tonight to explain their speed and directions: they seemed to go high first on the south west, some looking like dancing with each other, and then crossing straight over london to the north east. we caught it on camcorder and have still to process it, let us know if you would be interested in seeing the video. i suppose we will know more about this tomorrow, as we are probably not the only ones to have witnessed that. best regards, *(names deleted -- sgonzalez\cms).
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
